description: Housed in a 15C building in the centre of town, this restaurant boasts beautiful vaulted ceilings and a smart, elegant ambience. The young owner-chef serves cuisine with a traditional focus which is reinterpreted in modern style and made from excellent regional ingredients, as well as a few fish options. Efficient, punctual service.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
